description: FULLY RENOVATED home in sought-after Francisco Lane, South Slope! Boasting over 1,690 sq ft across 3 levels, this 4 BED + 3 BATH home offers a bright, spacious primary suite w/ a spa-inspired ensuite featuring an illuminated double vanity, quartz counters, tile backsplash & ample storage. Two additional generous bdrms share a beautifully updated bath. The main floor showcases an open living/dining area w/ a GAS fireplace & sliding doors to a large deck. The kitchen incl. a roomy eating area, oversized marble tile, shaker cabinets, S/S appliances, quartz counters & access to the back deck. The lower level features a large bdrm, updated bath, laundry & access to a double SIDE-BY-SIDE garage. Well managed complex with pool, hot tub, gym & maintained grounds. Walking distance to everything!
